book.synopsis: The champion of an ancient, all-embracing Culture in which there is no disease or disaster, Gurgeh beats everyone at a series of endless games, until he accepts the challenge from the Empire of Azad and discovers what the Game is really all about. Reprint.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.25 Inches, Length: 6.25 Inches, Weight: 0.75 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
